#B874ADAlu'Couatl.espC.A.CastoBorn of the Demiplane of Shadow, the Shadow Naga race is truly nightmarish. Contained in this plugin are both the couatl and alu'couatl, a new character race that combines the abilities of their lesser kin with more humanoid qualities. #36C2AFCrystal Armor.espN/AN/A[['Morrowind.esm', 79837557]]69Crystal Armor-7096.ziphttps://www.nexusmods.com/morrowind/mods/7096
#1B13AACrystal_Forge.espEJ!AZThis mod is about the Crystal Forge with which you can create Crystal Weapons and Crystal Armor. Light as Glass but slightly more powerful than the Daedric counterpart. Should not unbalance the game unless you enchant the items. #7D56B5TradehouseBasement.ESPTizzoArrille has refurbished the basement room of his Tradehouse in Seyda Neen. Look for a rental notice near Arrille, and present it to him to be offered a chance to rent the room. Includes various scripted amenties. See ReadMe.txt for details.
